statements: SELECT * FROM Patents;
SELECT patent_id, inventor FROM Patents WHERE filing_date = '2022-05-30';
SELECT inventor FROM Patents WHERE patent_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM Patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Patents FROM Patents;
SELECT * FROM Patents WHERE inventor LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT patent_id, inventor FROM Patents WHERE filing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Patents WHERE filing_date >= '2022-06-01' AND filing_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY inventor;
SELECT filing_date, COUNT(*) AS total_patents FROM Patents GROUP BY filing_date;
SELECT DISTINCT inventor FROM Patents WHERE inventor IS NOT NULL ORDER BY inventor ASC;
SELECT * FROM patents
SELECT id, inventor_name, patent_number FROM patents
SELECT filing_date, inventor_name FROM patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC
SELECT id, inventor_name FROM patents WHERE filing_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT inventor_name, COUNT(*) FROM patents GROUP BY inventor_name
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE filing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT inventor_name FROM patents WHERE patent_number LIKE 'US%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patents FROM patents;
SELECT * FROM patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT inventor_name, filing_date FROM patents WHERE inventor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT patent_title, filing_date FROM patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT inventor_name, inventor_country FROM inventors WHERE inventor_country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM patents JOIN patents_inventors ON patents.patent_id = patents_inventors.patent_id;
SELECT inventor_name, COUNT(patent_id) AS num_patents FROM inventors JOIN patents_inventors ON inventors.inventor_id = patents_inventors.inventor_id GROUP BY inventor_name ORDER BY num_patents DESC;
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT patent_title, filing_date FROM patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT inventor_name, inventor_country FROM inventors WHERE inventor_country = 'USA';
SELECT p.patent_title, i.inventor_name FROM patents p INNER JOIN patents_inventors pi ON p.patent_id = pi.patent_id INNER JOIN inventors i ON pi.inventor_id = i.inventor_id;

SELECT inventor_name, COUNT(*) AS num_patents FROM patents p INNER JOIN patents_inventors pi ON p.patent_id = pi.patent_id INNER JOIN inventors i ON pi.inventor_id = i.inventor_id GROUP BY inventor_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE filing_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT inventor, patent_number FROM patents WHERE filing_date < '2019-06-01';
SELECT filing_date, inventor FROM patents WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE inventor = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT id, inventor FROM patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT filing_date, inventor, patent_number FROM patents WHERE filing_date > '2021-01-01' AND inventor LIKE '%John%';
SELECT pf.file_name, pf.file_type, po.owner_name FROM patent_files pf INNER JOIN patent_owners po ON pf.id = po.id;
SELECT p.id, p.patent_number, i.first_name, i.lastjson_name FROM patents p INNER JOIN inventors i ON p.inventor = i.id ORDER BY p.id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT patent_id, filing_date FROM patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventors WHERE birth_date < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patent_id, inventor_id FROM patent_inventors LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_id, company_name FROM companies WHERE headquarters_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT patent_id, filing_date FROM patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, birth_date FROM inventors WHERE birth_date >= '1980-01-01';
SELECT company_name, COUNT(patent_id) AS num_patents FROM company_patents GROUP BY company_name HAVING num_patents > 5;

SELECT patents.patent_id, inventors.full_name, companies.company_name FROM patents JOIN patent_inventors ON patents.patent_id = patent_inventors.patent_id JOIN inventors ON inventors.inventor_id = patent_inventors.inventor_id JOIN company_patents ON patents.patent_id = company_patents.patent_id JOIN companies ON companies.company_id = company_patents.company_id;
